desc: Lizzie Onions Emporium is a new online homestyle boutique. Our eclectic range of home decor features beautiful soft furnishings, tableware, cushions and bags, ceramics, scented candles, Bone China cups and mugs, vases, storage baskets and light fixtures. We also include works by artists Frida Kahlo and Piero Fornasetti

layout.text: OUR NEW HOMESTYLE BOUTIQUE SOURCES BEAUTIFUL, ECLECTIC GORGEOUSNESS FROM AROUND THE WORLD.
